machine_start_gcode.value:
";---start-gcode---
G28
M207 S{retraction_amount} F{retraction_retract_speed_2} R{retraction_extra_prime_length} T{retraction_prime_speed_2} ;set retraction parameters
M220 S100 ;reset feedrate factor
M221 S100 ;reset extruder factor
M290 R0 S0 ;rest babystepping
G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M83 ;relative extrusion (reprap mgith not done by G90)
M107 ;start with the fan off
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;set bed temperature and wait
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} ;set nozzle temperature and wait
; assume we have already home by either octoprint or duet
G1 X15.0 Y2.0 F4000 ;move X/Y to front of printer
G0 Z30.0 F9000 ;move the platform to 30mm
G1 F180 E+25.0 ;extrude 25 mm of feed stock
G1 F90 E+15.0 ;extrude 15 mm of feed stock
G1 F1800 E-10.0 ;retract filament a bit
G1 F1800 E+11.0 ;restore filament
G1 X90 Z0.25 F9000 ;lower head to plate
G91 ;temporary set to relative mode
G1 Z{adhesion_z_offset} ;adjust z offset
G90 ;set back to absolute mode
G1 X110.0 E4.0 F240 ;wipe head
G1 X115.0 F4200 ;wipe faster
G1 Z3.0 F9000 ;raise head
;---start-gcode---
" if machine_gcode_flavor == "RepRap (RepRap)" else "G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G28 Z0 ;move Z to bottom endstops
G28 X0 Y0 ;move X/Y to endstops
G1 X15 Y0 F4000 ;move X/Y to front of printer
G1 Z15.0 F9000 ;move the platform to 15mm
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E10 ;extrude 10 mm of feed stock
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length again
G1 F9000
;Put printing message on LCD screen
M117 Printing..."

machine_end_gcode.value:
";--- stop gcode ---
M104 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
M83 ;relative extrusion
G1 E-20 F1800  ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+1 X-20 Y-20 F9000 ;move Z up a bit
G28 Z ; home Z
G28 X Y ;move X/Y to min endstops, so the head is out of the way
M84 ;stop holding
; --- stop gcode --- 
" if machine_gcode_flavor == "RepRap (RepRap)" else "G90 ;absolute positioning
M104 S0 T0 ;extruder heater off
M104 S0 T1
M140 S0 ;turn off bed
T0 ; move to the first head
M107 ;fan off"
